alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 3:24AM MDT until April 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From Monday evening through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
